attributes.action: ensure Glasgow Celtic F.C reach a contractual agreement with Artur Boruc to extend his stay with the club.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Artur Boruc is undoubtedly one of the finest goalkeepers in Europe, if not the world. He consistently performs at the highest level for both club and country and is a cult figure with Celtic fans worldwide. However, a contractual dispute is threatening to end his stay in Glasgow in a legal wrangle, please sign this petition to ensure Celtic meet his every demand.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
